item.title: Competitve Programming
item.description: Competitive Coding Resources Here are some CP resources that I found useful. Why did I write this blog? Good question! There are plenty of resources out there on how to start competitive programming but what I found missing there were proper links to resources. I also had selfish reasons:- I wanted a short description, which nevertheless contained the major ideas underlying the algorithms, a discussion of their relative strengths and weaknesses, with hints on what is known (and not known, but would be good to know) about these algorithms.
